arguments.info: Chart name to be installed.
Use chart development versions, too. Equivalent to version '>0.0.0-0'. If version is set, this is ignored

Release name.
Namespace to install the release into.
Perform pods restart during upgrade/rollback
Repository where to locate the requested chart. If is an URL the chart is installed without installing the repository.
Instruct Tiller to re-use an existing name.
Reuse values when upgrading the release.

Time in seconds to wait for any individual kubernetes operation.
List of values in raw yaml file to pass to helm.
Verify the package before installing it.
Specify the exact chart version to install. If this is not specified, the latest version is installed.
Will wait until all resources are in a ready state before marking the release as successful.
